definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

pinyin: ren2 xing2 di4 xia4 tong1 dao4

sentences.english: The children were detained as hostage in the underground.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們被扣押在地下通道里作人質。

sentences.english: The Hanger Lane underpass was closed through flooding.
sentences.chinese: 發洪水期間，漢格巷地下通道被關閉。

sentences.english: There is a underpass under the house.
One such tunnel served as an air raid shelter in World War II.
sentences.chinese: 有一條地下通道在二戰時期曾用來做爲防空洞。

sentences.english: The Young Pioneers went to clean the underground passages after school.
sentences.chinese: 少先隊員們放學後去清掃地下通道。

sentences.english: When one crosses the street, one should take the crosswalk, underground passage or pedestrian overpass.
sentences.chinese: 當你穿過馬路，要走人行橫道或過街天橋，地下通道。

sentences.english: Trials - Sneak through the underground passage without tearing your scarf.
sentences.chinese: 圍巾未損壞下隱密地通過地下通道。

sentences.english: The house has an underground passage .
sentences.chinese: 這房子有一條地下通道。

sentences.english: Straighten out the sword found in the underground passage.
sentences.chinese: 把地下通道里找到的劍弄直。

sentences.english: They caved in the roof of the underground passage with powerful explosives.
sentences.chinese: 他們用強大的炸藥把地下通道的頂部炸塌陷了。

definition: Tianqiao district of Jinan city 濟南市|济南市[Ji3 nan2 shi4], Shandong/Tianqiao district in Beijing, formerly a center of folk culture

pinyin: ren2 xing2 di4 xia4 tong1 dao4
